cocktail.name: Negroni Cocktail
cocktail.Instruction: Pour all into ice-filled glass and stir
cocktail.garnish: Orange wedge or orange zest twist

cocktail.name: Southside Rickey
cocktail.Instruction: Shake all except soda water with ice. Strain into ice-filled glass then top with soda.

cocktail.name: Bee's Knees
cocktail.Instruction: Shake for 10 seconds. Strain and Fine mesh strainer into glass.

cocktail.name: Boulevardier
cocktail.Instruction: Put ice directly into a Rocks glass. Pour the Campari, Sweet Vermouth, and Gin into your Rocks glass. Use a stirring spoon and swivel for 10 seconds. Garnish with orange peel (optional). Enjoy your Boulevardier

cocktail.name: FIERY GINGER SOUR
cocktail.Instruction: Add all to your cocktail shaker with ice. Yes, that means separate your egg. Shake. Seriously, for like a full minute. That’s 60 nonstop seconds. It sucks, but it’s worth it when you drink it. Pour into your glass. Garnish with candied ginger. Smile thinking about Machu Picchu. Then remember you’re drinking fiery ginger. Some say, even better.

cocktail.name: French 75
cocktail.Instruction: Add the gin, lemon juice and sugar into your cocktail shaker with ice. Shake like you mean it (you want to chill it and dissolve that sugar, that's why we went ultrafine). Evenly pour into two champagne flutes. Top with chilled champagne. Garnish with lemon peel. Smile, drink and toast to good health.

cocktail.name: HEMINGWAY DAIQUIRI
cocktail.Instruction: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Irish Cocktail
cocktail.Instruction: Add the whiskey, absinthe, curacao, maraschino and bitters to your mixing glass with ice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Income Tax
cocktail.Instruction: Add everything to your shaker with ice. Shake. Pour into your coupe.

cocktail.name: Cardinale
cocktail.Instruction: Stire all with ice and strian into ice-filled glass

cocktail.name: Maon`o War
cocktail.Instruction: Shake all with ice and strian into chilled glass

cocktail.name: Gold Rush
cocktail.Instruction: Shake all with ice and fine strian into ice-filled glass

cocktail.name: Boston Sour
cocktail.Instruction: Shake all with ice and strain back into shaker. Shake without ice, then fine drain into chilled glass

cocktail.name: Bourbon Skin
cocktail.Instruction: Pour all ingredients into warmed glass and Stir

cocktail.name: Fancy Free
cocktail.Instruction: Stire all ingredients with ice. Strain into ice-filled glass. (block ice)

cocktail.name: Inside Job Coktail
cocktail.Instruction: Stir all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

cocktail.name: Mountain
cocktail.Instruction: Shake all. Fine strain into chilled glass.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Sour(Classic)
cocktail.Instruction: Shake all. Strain into ice-filled glass.
cocktail.garnish: Lime slice, Luxardo cherry on stick.

cocktail.name: Scofflaw
cocktail.Instruction: Shake all. Fine strain into chilled glass.
